title: lag spikes and disconect
body:
i cannot play,it gose up to 15 000 ping then 9000 and i can not reconect
and game takes it as abandon
now it put me in low priority thingy
it started 1 week ago,im sure its not my end cause everything is working fine
i tried ip reset  and stuff but it keeps lagging and it says i abandon but im not
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
I definitely get where you are coming from!  I know that you aren't leaving or disconnecting games on purpose and you want it to stop, so lets start digging into it shall we?  The best step you can take at the moment is to use our [Log Reader Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743).  By doing so, we can analyze the last few games you've played, determine if there are any connection issues found, and provide solutions if it does!  Hopefully we can narrow down to the actual root cause!

If the steps there don't seem to help at all, feel free to come back and reply!  We'll make sure to help out further!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=R43wbIt4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-25T02:34:36.466+0000)
>
> I definitely get where you are coming from!  I know that you aren't leaving or disconnecting games on purpose and you want it to stop, so lets start digging into it shall we?  The best step you can take at the moment is to use our [Log Reader Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743).  By doing so, we can analyze the last few games you've played, determine if there are any connection issues found, and provide solutions if it does!  Hopefully we can narrow down to the actual root cause!
> 
> If the steps there don't seem to help at all, feel free to come back and reply!  We'll make sure to help out further!


thanks for reply  =':'=


**NETWORK DIAGNOSTIC OVERALL RATING: MAJOR ISSUES**
thats what i got on all my last **4 or 5 matchs**
i could reconect and end sometimes others just dont

**Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 11.98%.**
Your average ping was 376 milliseconds.
**
The worst ping you experienced was 9730ms. **

where i live now

http://www.speedtest.net/result/6568345183.png


where my uncle family lives(i think,idk well wheres **Fort Lauderdale **or something like that)
i play games online with em hosting from my pc(Skyrim online,minecraft,roller coaster tycoon 2 multpplayer,diablo etc) no problem nor lag
http://www.speedtest.net/result/6568353152.png

i was playing {{champion:516}}  most of my match history defeats are cause of this lag i just bought it and wanna test but i cant even play cause game freezes and everyone slides around
and Ornn is purrtastic

i bump,no solution still
and im getting the low prio queue of 10 minutes for the disconnects
it happend again,now i have to wait 9 minutes+find(aprox 2 min more) in queue to join a match

improved my wifi with  homemade radar like antenna


now i know where fort lauderdale is,near Miami
using speedtest selected server Comcast it goes up to **20 mb download,2 upload** ,AND **STILL LAGS** so its not my computer problem
http://www.speedtest.net/result/6571178902.png

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
